root.info: Visualization preferences for the Siren algorithm. A default preferences file can be obtained by copying this file and removing the <default> tags around default values.

parameter.name: intab_nbr
parameter.label: Intab grid rows
parameter.legend: Number of rows of the grid for visualizations in the tab.

parameter.name: intab_nbc
parameter.label: Intab grid cols
parameter.legend: Number of columns of the grid for visualizations in the tab.

parameter.name: color_l
parameter.label: Color LHS
parameter.legend: Color for plotting the LHS support.

parameter.name: color_r
parameter.label: Color RHS
parameter.legend: Color for plotting the RHS support.

parameter.name: color_i
parameter.label: Color Intersection
parameter.legend: Color for plotting the intersection support.

parameter.name: color_o
parameter.label: Color Uncovered
parameter.legend: Color for plotting the uncovered entities.

parameter.name: color_h
parameter.label: Color Highlight
parameter.legend: Color for highlighting entities.

parameter.name: dot_size
parameter.label: Dot size
parameter.legend: Size of the dots in points.

parameter.name: dot_shape
parameter.label: Dot shape
parameter.legend: Shape of the dots

parameter.name: miss_details
parameter.label: Detailed missing
parameter.legend: Show details of different missing values.

parameter.name: draw_delta
parameter.label: Draw uncovered
parameter.legend: Draw uncovered entities (map)

parameter.name: click_entities
parameter.label: Click entities
parameter.legend: Show details entities labels on click.

parameter.name: hover_entities
parameter.label: Hover entities
parameter.legend: Show details entities labels on hover.

parameter.name: details_level
parameter.label: Details level
parameter.legend: Level of details for plotting the parallel coordinates.

parameter.name: literals_contrib
parameter.label: Show literals contribution
parameter.legend: Show contribution of literals (PaCo)

parameter.name: map_resolution
parameter.label: Resolution
parameter.legend: Resolution of the map elements.

parameter.name: map_proj
parameter.label: Projection
parameter.legend: Projection to use for the map.

parameter.name: llon
parameter.label: Left corner longitude
parameter.legend: Map boundary's left corner longitude.

parameter.name: ulon
parameter.label: Right corner longitude
parameter.legend: Map boundary's right corner longitude.

parameter.name: llat
parameter.label: Lower corner latitude
parameter.legend: Map boundary's lower corner latitude.

parameter.name: ulat
parameter.label: Upper corner latitude
parameter.legend: Map boundary's upper corner latitude.

parameter.name: line_color
parameter.label: Line color
parameter.legend: Color for drawing map lines.

parameter.name: sea_color
parameter.label: Sea color
parameter.legend: Color for filling water bodies in maps.

parameter.name: land_color
parameter.label: Land color
parameter.legend: Color for filling land areas in maps.

parameter.name: map_elem_area
parameter.label: Map natural areas
parameter.legend: Map natural areas to paint.

parameter.name: map_elem_natural
parameter.label: Map natural elements
parameter.legend: Map natural elements to draw.

parameter.name: map_elem_geop
parameter.label: Map geopolitic elements
parameter.legend: Map geopolitic borders to paint.

parameter.name: map_elem_circ
parameter.label: Map imaginary circles
parameter.legend: Map imaginary circles to draw.

parameter.name: map_back
parameter.label: Map background
parameter.legend: Background to use for the map.

parameter.name: map_back_alpha
parameter.label: Map background opacity
parameter.legend: Opacity of the background image.

parameter.name: map_back_scale
parameter.label: Map background scale
parameter.legend: Scale of the background image.

parameter.name: map_poly
parameter.label: Polygons
parameter.legend: Use polygons to represent entities on the map
